description.title: Stress - multiple concurrent subscribers, additional clients subscribing and unsubscribing
description.purpose:
A configurable number of subscribers are started to receive events from Obscuro, which stay subscribed for the duration of the test. Another configurable number of subscribers are started, where they continually subscribe and then unsubscribe once call back on successful subscription is confirmed. Once running a set number of transactions are performed where they are expected to be received by the permanent subscribers i.e. the concurrent subscribes and unsubscribes should not cause any disruption to event notification / call back.
Skipped due to https://github.com/obscuronet/obscuro-internal/issues/1457
